last_episode_to_air.name: Battle Without a Quirk
last_episode_to_air.overview: Toga returns the smile of Ochaco, who tried to be friends with her. What does Toga do to the seriously-injured Ochaco? Meanwhile, All Might uses "power" developed by a friend to face All For One!

name: My Hero Academia
original_name: 僕のヒーローアカデミア
overview: A superhero-admiring boy without any powers enrolls in a prestigious hero academy and learns what it really means to be a hero.

episodes.name: Izuku Midoriya: Origin
episodes.overview: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

episodes.name: What It Takes to Be a Hero
episodes.overview: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might’s secret, but there’s trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

episodes.name: Roaring Muscles
episodes.overview: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

episodes.name: Start Line
episodes.overview: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

episodes.name: What I Can Do for Now
episodes.overview: It’s Izuku’s first day of high school, and he still can’t control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

episodes.name: Rage, You Damn Nerd
episodes.overview: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might…

episodes.name: Deku vs. Kacchan
episodes.overview: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

episodes.name: Bakugo’s Start Line
episodes.overview: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

episodes.name: Yeah, Just Do Your Best, Iida!
episodes.overview: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

episodes.name: Encounter with the Unknown
episodes.overview: Villains have attacked USJ, and it’s up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

episodes.name: All Might
episodes.overview: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

episodes.name: In Each of Our Hearts
episodes.overview: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

episodes.name: That’s the Idea, Ochaco
episodes.overview: As U.A. students and teachers recover from the League of Villains attack on USJ, Izuku learns about why Ochaco wants to become a hero.

episodes.name: Roaring Sports Festival
episodes.overview: The U.A. sports festival begins and all eyes are on the first-years as they start their qualifying round—the obstacle course race.

episodes.name: In Their Own Quirky Ways
episodes.overview: The first years try to stand out as they struggle to finish the obstacle course and qualify for a spot in the next round.

episodes.name: Strategy, Strategy, Strategy
episodes.overview: Izuku’s having trouble finding a team for the cavalry battle in the next round of the U.A. sports festival. Luckily, he has a plan.

episodes.name: Cavalry Battle Finale
episodes.overview: Fighting it out in the second half of the cavalry battle, does Team Midoriya have what it takes to stay in the top four?

episodes.name: The Boy Born with Everything
episodes.overview: Izuku learns more about Todoroki’s past as the first-years head into the final round of the sports festival.

episodes.name: Victory or Defeat
episodes.overview: Izuku is up against Shinso in the first match of the finals, but can he overcome Shinso’s Quirk to advance to the next round?

episodes.name: Battle on, Challengers!
episodes.overview: It’s one match after another in the first round of the finals tournament. Who will advance to second round?

episodes.name: Bakugo vs. Uraraka
episodes.overview: Bakugo seems almost villainous when he’s up against Uraraka, but she has a plan to keep it from being a one-sided match.

episodes.name: Shoto Todoroki: Origin
episodes.overview: Izuku forces Todoroki to face his past in a chilling battle as the two class rivals finally go head to head!

episodes.name: Fight On, Iida
episodes.overview: It’s class rep versus child prodigy as Iida and Todoroki square off. Will Iida’s Reciproburst be enough to beat the boy of fire and ice?

episodes.name: Todoroki vs. Bakugo
episodes.overview: The explosive showdown between Todoroki and Bakugo begins. Only one can take the title of first-year champion!

episodes.name: Time to Pick Some Names
episodes.overview: Following their epic debut at the sports festival, it’s time for the first-years to pick the most important part of their identities—their hero name!

episodes.name: Bizarre! Gran Torino Appears
episodes.overview: The internships begin! While everyone adjusts to their new tasks, Izuku starts training with Gran Torino, the same man who once taught All Might.

episodes.name: Midoriya and Shigaraki
episodes.overview: The U.A. students are finally starting to get the hang of their internships, but Izuku has much more to learn about One For All.

episodes.name: Hero Killer: Stain vs U.A. Students
episodes.overview: Stain strikes again, and this time some U.A. students are around when it happens. Will they be able to hold him off until the pros come?

episodes.name: Climax
episodes.overview: It all comes to a head as Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki face off against Stain while the pro heroes in Hosu City fight against the Nomus.

episodes.name: The Aftermath of Hero Killer: Stain
episodes.overview: Stain is finally captured, but while the hero community deals with the consequences, an even greater challenge is set in motion.

episodes.name: Everyone's Internships
episodes.overview: As Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki recover from their fight with Stain, the other members of Class 1-A work hard at their own internships.

episodes.name: Listen Up!! A Tale from the Past
episodes.overview: The students return to their daily lives while All Might has a special history lesson for Izuku. It’s time to learn about One For All!

episodes.name: Gear up for Final Exams
episodes.overview: Finals are coming up and Class 1-A is going to need more than a cram session. This year, the teachers are changing the practical exams.

episodes.name: Yaoyorozu: Rising
episodes.overview: The exams are turning out to be much more challenging than the students expected. Can any of the teams hold their own against a teacher?

episodes.name: Stripping the Varnish
episodes.overview: As the students of Class 1-A fight in their practical exams, their resolve to become heroes is put to the test.

episodes.name: Katsuki Bakugo: Origin
episodes.overview: It’s finally time for Izuku and Bakugo’s practical exam. How can they challenge All Might without a plan?

episodes.name: Encounter
episodes.overview: Class 1-A goes shopping for training camp supplies, but things get out of hand when a villain pulls Izuku aside.

episodes.name: Game Start
episodes.overview: Before the U.A. students head to their training camp, Class 1-A goes to the pool for extra training, and the League of Villains plots their next move.

episodes.name: Wild, Wild Pussycats
episodes.overview: Class 1-A faces the first challenge of their summer training camp when they have to fight their way through “The Beast’s Forest” before lunch.

episodes.name: Kota
episodes.overview: Izuku tries to talk with Kota as the first-years start their training in earnest. Little do they know what awaits them in the forest.

episodes.name: My Hero
episodes.overview: The villains launch their attack, and only Izuku knows where Kota is. Can he get to him in time?

episodes.name: Drive It Home, Iron Fist!!!
episodes.overview: Izuku finally makes it back to the training camp only to leave again with a message for Mandalay to broadcast.

episodes.name: Roaring Upheaval
episodes.overview: The students and teachers of U.A. are still fighting in the woods, but has the Vanguard Action Squad accomplished its mission already…?!

episodes.name: What a Twist!
episodes.overview: The battle at the training camp concludes, and now the students and teachers of U.A. have to deal with the aftermath.

episodes.name: From Iida to Midoriya
episodes.overview: Todoroki, Kirishima, and Midoriya want to go after Bakugo, but the class rep is standing in their way. Meanwhile, Shigaraki makes Bakugo an offer…

episodes.name: All For One
episodes.overview: The heroes and U.A. students close in on the League of Villains’ hideouts, but the League still has an ace up its sleeve.

episodes.name: Symbol of Peace
episodes.overview: As the fight against the League of Villains escalates, can the U.A. students get Bakugo out in time for All Might to make a big comeback?

episodes.name: One For All
episodes.overview: All Might’s time is running out as he faces his ultimate nemesis head on. Will he finally be able to defeat All For One once and for all?

episodes.name: End of the Beginning, Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: After All Might and All For One’s fight, the students go back home while the U.A. teachers decide how to deal with the aftermath.

episodes.name: Moving into Dorms
episodes.overview: The students of Class 1-A move into their dorms and hold a competition to determine who has the best room.

episodes.name: Create Those Ultimate Moves
episodes.overview: Class 1-A works on developing their Quirks and creating ultimate moves to prepare for the provisional hero licensing exam.

episodes.name: The Test
episodes.overview: Izuku and his classmates make some final adjustments to their ultimate moves and then head off to the provisional licensing exam.

episodes.name: Shiketsu High Lurking
episodes.overview: The exam has begun, and everyone’s after Class 1-A! Can the first-years last long enough to pass this first test?

episodes.name: Class 1-A
episodes.overview: Todoroki’s on his own against Seijin High, and Yaoyorozu’s group is pitted against Seiai Academy as they and the rest of Class 1-A fight to pass the first test.

episodes.name: RUSH!
episodes.overview: It’s down to the final minutes of the first test and almost half of Class 1-A has yet to earn a passing score!

episodes.name: Rescue Exercises
episodes.overview: The second test of the provisional licensing has begun, and the hero candidates are suddenly thrust into a rescue operation.

episodes.name: Special Episode: Save the World with Love!
episodes.overview: We take a break from the provisional licensing exam to visit a class held before the summer training camp!

episodes.name: What’s the Big Idea?
episodes.overview: The exam nears its end, but Izuku and the other hero candidates must fend off Gang Orca to finish the rescue mission.

episodes.name: A Talk about Your Quirk
episodes.overview: While the U.A. students finish up the provisional licensing exam and get their results, All Might has a talk with All For One.

episodes.name: Deku vs. Kacchan, Part 2
episodes.overview: Following the provisional licensing exam, Izuku tries out his Shoot Style on Bakugo as they have a heart-to-heart through their fight.

episodes.name: A Season for Encounters
episodes.overview: The world has changed for villains and heroes alike in the weeks after All Might’s fight with All For One, and the U.A. students start their second semester.

episodes.name: Unrivaled
episodes.overview: The students of Class 1-A learn about work studies from the Big Three. Meanwhile, the villains also prepare their next steps.

episodes.name: The Scoop on U.A. Class 1-A
episodes.overview: After All Might announces his retirement, freelance reporter Taneo Tokuda goes to the dorms to investigate U.A. Class 1-A.

episodes.name: Overhaul
episodes.overview: Overhaul pays a visit to the League of Villains, and Midoriya tries to find a place to do his work study.

episodes.name: Boy Meets…
episodes.overview: Izuku battles Sir Nighteye so he can do his work study at Nighteye’s agency, but Nighteye has someone else in mind to be All Might’s successor…

episodes.name: Fighting Fate
episodes.overview: Izuku’s mind is swirling with feelings from his work study, so he goes and talks to All Might about it and learns about All Might’s fate.

episodes.name: Let’s Go, Gutsy Red Riot
episodes.overview: The U.A. work study students go out with their respective heroes and become involved in some big fights.

episodes.name: An Unpleasant Talk
episodes.overview: The work study students from U.A. attend a meeting of heroes gathered by Sir Nighteye and leave with new resolve.

episodes.name: GO!!
episodes.overview: The work study students wait until the pro heroes find Eri and it’s time to start the operation to save her.

episodes.name: Suneater of the Big Three
episodes.overview: The Shie Hassaikai is going all out to stop the heroes, and Suneater volunteers to take out the first batch of Eight Bullets members in their way.

episodes.name: Red Riot
episodes.overview: As the fight with the Shie Hassaikai continues, Kirishima has to face his past when he and Fat Gum get separated from the others.

episodes.name: Temp Squad
episodes.overview: The Hassaikai gets some help from the League of Villains as the heroes continue to make their way to Chisaki to rescue Eri.

episodes.name: Lemillion
episodes.overview: The League of Villains stay true to their name in their fight. Meanwhile, Togata catches up to Chisaki and Eri first…

episodes.name: Unforeseen Hope
episodes.overview: Izuku, Eraser Head, and Sir Nighteye finally reach the area where Chisaki and the others are and find Togata past his limit…

episodes.name: Infinite 100%
episodes.overview: As the fight with the Shie Hassaikai reaches its climax, Chisaki looks back on how it all started, and Izuku uses All For One at 100%.

episodes.name: Bright Future
episodes.overview: As the heroes deal with the aftermath of the fight with the Shie Hassaikai, the vehicle transporting Chisaki has an encounter with the League of Villains…

episodes.name: Smoldering Flames
episodes.overview: After the fight with the Shie Hassaikai, a new villain emerges, and the students who participated reflect on their own roles as future heroes.

episodes.name: Win Those Kids’ Hearts
episodes.overview: Camie joins the provisional license training course and is added to the team working with the kids from Masegaki. Meanwhile, Endeavor has a serious talk with All Might.

episodes.name: Relief for License Trainees
episodes.overview: The trainees bond with the precocious Masegaki kids and life at U.A. goes back to normal as autumn approaches, but Aoyama has been acting strangely…

episodes.name: School Festival
episodes.overview: As the students of U.A. prepare for their school festival, Deku and Togata visit Eri in the hospital. Meanwhile, a new villain named Gentle Criminal begins his reign of crime.

episodes.name: Prepping for the School Festival Is the Most Fun Part
episodes.overview: Class 1-A assigns roles for their performance at the school festival, and Gentle starts preparing his next plan.

episodes.name: Gold Tips Imperial
episodes.overview: Eri visits U.A. while the students are preparing for the school festival, and Gentle finalizes his plans.

episodes.name: Deku vs. Gentle Criminal
episodes.overview: As Deku buys some last-minute supplies for the school festival, he encounters a mysterious man wrapped in a trench coat…

episodes.name: School Festival Start!!
episodes.overview: Izuku must stop Gentle Criminal and his partner, La Brava, or else the school festival will be cancelled.

episodes.name: Let It Flow! School Festival!
episodes.overview: Izuku rushes back to the school festival after his encounter with Gentleman and La Brava, but will he make it in time for his performance?

episodes.name: Japanese Hero Billboard Chart
episodes.overview: It’s time for the next Japanese Hero Billboard Chart rankings to be announced, and this time, all the top ten heroes make an appearance.

episodes.name: His Start
episodes.overview: Endeavor and Hawks are up against High-End, and it’s Endeavor’s chance to show the world what the new number one hero is like.

episodes.name: All Hands on Deck! Class 1-A
episodes.overview: There's an emergency drill at U.A. High School, and Class 1-A is requested to report for duty!

episodes.name: Vestiges
episodes.overview: After their fight with the Nomu, Hawks and Endeavor return to daily life, and Izuku dreams of One For All…

episodes.name: Clash! Class A vs. Class B!
episodes.overview: Class A and Class B are joined by a special guest as they battle it out during their joint combat training.

episodes.name: Make It Happen, Shinso!
episodes.overview: The Class A team tries to put Shinso and his new equipment to good use in the first match against Class B.

episodes.name: Operation New Improv Moves
episodes.overview: It's darkness versus darkness as Tokoyami and Kuroiro face off in the second match of the class battles!

episodes.name: Foresight
episodes.overview: Separated from her team, Yaoyorozu's leadership skills are put to the test in the second match of the class battles.

episodes.name: Match 3
episodes.overview: In the third match of the class battles, Honenuki leads the Class B team against a well-balanced Class A team.

episodes.name: Match 3 Conclusion
episodes.overview: It's still anybody's game as the the third match continues with an endurance battle between Todoroki and Tetsutetsu.

episodes.name: Early Bird!
episodes.overview: Bakugo shows a different side of himself in the fourth team match as the class battles continue.

episodes.name: That Which Is Inherited
episodes.overview: Midoriya and Shinso face off for the first time since the sports festival in the last fight of the class battles.

episodes.name: Our Brawl
episodes.overview: It's an all-out brawl as the last two teams from Class A and Class B fight it out to the finish!

episodes.name: The New Power and All For One
episodes.overview: As the class battles conclude, Midoriya works with All Might and Bakugo on learning more about his new power.

episodes.name: Have a Merry Christmas!
episodes.overview: It's Christmas at U.A. and the Class 1-A students celebrate with a Christmas party.

episodes.name: Off to Endeavor's Agency!
episodes.overview: Hawks acts strange when he meets Endeavor and his work study students on their way to Endeavor Agency.

episodes.name: One Thing at a Time
episodes.overview: As the villains continue to move behind the scenes, Endeavor helps his work study students with the next steps in their training.

episodes.name: Long Time No See, Selkie
episodes.overview: Ryukyu brings her work study students with her when Selkie asks her to team up with him.

episodes.name: The Hellish Todoroki Family
episodes.overview: Endeavor brings his work study students over for dinner at Fuyumi's request but faces awkward conversations at home.

episodes.name: The Unforgiven
episodes.overview: One of Endeavor's biggest fans shows up to settle some unfinished business, and he expects far more than an autograph.

episodes.name: More of a Hero Than Anyone
episodes.overview: When an unsettling discovery is made regarding Kurogiri, Aizawa and Present Mic are summoned to interrogate him.

episodes.name: My Villain Academia
episodes.overview: A series of surprise encounters helps give Shigaraki a new sense of direction for the League of Villains.

episodes.name: Revival Party
episodes.overview: The League of Villains waits for Gigantomachia to wake up as they clash with the Meta Liberation Army.

episodes.name: Sad Man's Parade
episodes.overview: As Twice tries to save Toga, he thinks back on his past and makes a realization that helps him overcome it.

episodes.name: Tenko Shimura: Origin
episodes.overview: Memories from Shigaraki's past as Tenko Shimura resurface as he confronts Re-Destro.

episodes.name: Tomura Shigaraki: Origin
episodes.overview: Shigaraki remembers his first encounter with All For One during the climax of his battle with Re-Destro.

episodes.name: The High, Deep Blue Sky
episodes.overview: Both sides prepare for the confrontation between the heroes and the Paranormal Liberation Front as Class 1-A finishes their first year of high school.

episodes.name: A Quiet Beginning
episodes.overview: Using the information Hawks gathered, the heroes and their work study students get ready for an attack on the Paranormal Liberation Front led by Shigaraki.

episodes.name: Mirko, the No. 5 Hero
episodes.overview: As Endeavor and the others fight the Nomus at the hospital, Mirko goes against Kyudai Garaki's best soldiers, the High-Ends. Meanwhile, Kaminari steels his resolve to save those he cares about and goes to the front line of team Edgeshot.

episodes.name: One's Justice
episodes.overview: Inside Gunga Villa, the Paranormal Liberation Front realizes that they are under attack, and Twice confronts Hawks about his betrayal.

episodes.name: Inheritance
episodes.overview: An enraged Dabi confronts Hawks after Twice's death, meanwhile at the Hospital Endeavor, Eraser head, Crust, Present Mic and X-less finally arrive to help Mirko, who's risking her life to stop Shigaraki's awakening.

episodes.name: The Thrill of Destruction
episodes.overview: The fight against the High-End Nomus in Jaku Hospital continues however they are unaware that Tomura Shigaraki has awakened. Whilst this is happening, Tokoyami flies in to try and save Hawks from Dabi.

episodes.name: Encounter, Part 2
episodes.overview: Gigantomachia and the rest of the Paranormal Liberation Front gain the upper hand at the Gunga Mountain Villa as the newly awakened Tomura Shigaraki finds a new objective; steal One for All from Izuku Midoriya.

episodes.name: Disaster Walker
episodes.overview: The fight against Shigaraki continues while other heroes fight the new Nomus that Shigaraki summoned. While this is happening Team Edgeshot tries to stop Gigantomachia from making it to Jaku City.

episodes.name: League of Villains vs. U.A. Students
episodes.overview: The pro heroes' defensive net was broken through. Facing the monstrous giant are the U.A. hero course students. Class A and Class B work together to start a big operation to block Gigantomachia.

episodes.name: Katsuki Bakugo: Rising
episodes.overview: As Aizawa seems to be out of the battle, Midoriya tries to keep Shigaraki in the air utilizing all of his quirks. Knowing his limit is near, Bakugo comes up with a plan to help him.

episodes.name: The Ones Within Us
episodes.overview: Shigaraki's attack pierced right through Kacchan. Deku loses himself to his rage and thrust himself to Shigaraki. However, things change suddenly. In the world of One For All, Deku stand against Shigaraki and All For One.

episodes.name: Dabi's Dance
episodes.overview: As Ochaco and Toga exchange words and blows, Gigantomachia reaches Shigaraki and the heroes, and Dabi reveals the secret of his past.

episodes.name: Threads of Hope
episodes.overview: Best Jeanist appears and spins together the hopes of all the heroes in this fight as the climax of the all-out war draws near.

episodes.name: Final Performance
episodes.overview: Thinking of his great-great-grandfather, Mr. Compress performs his greatest trick in order to save the League of Villains.

episodes.name: Hellish Hell
episodes.overview: The heroes wrestle with changing public opinion as they deal with the aftermath of the fierce battle and mourn those they lost in the fight.

episodes.name: Tartarus
episodes.overview: Under All For One's control, Shigaraki attacks Tartarus with the Nomus to free All For One's body, freeing many other prisoners in the process.

episodes.name: The Hellish Todoroki Family, Part 2
episodes.overview: As heroes deal with criticism from the public, Hawks thinks back on his past with his family, and Endeavor's family visits him in the hospital.

episodes.name: The Wrong Way to Put Out a Fire
episodes.overview: Endeavor and his family reflect on Toya's past and the events that led to his death, and Hawks and Best Jeanist bring them a proposition.

episodes.name: Izuku Midoriya and Tomura Shigaraki
episodes.overview: Inside One For All, Izuku talks with the past wielders as the top three heroes deal with public sentiment after Dabi's revelation.

episodes.name: Full Power!!
episodes.overview: After Izuku decides not to go back to U.A., he finds himself facing Muscular, who was broken out of jail, again and uses the Quirks of the past wielders against him.

episodes.name: Hired Gun
episodes.overview: The top three heroes continue to face criticism as they deal with jailbreakers and look for hints about All For One and Shigaraki's whereabouts, and Izuku comes across a villain from Tartarus.

episodes.name: The Lovely Lady Nagant
episodes.overview: During Izuku's fight with Lady Nagant, she tells him secrets about hero society that further solidify his resolve to help those who need his help.

episodes.name: Friend
episodes.overview: As Izuku goes off alone in his quest for justice, his classmates realize something is wrong and try to find a way to help him.

episodes.name: Deku vs. Class A
episodes.overview: As Deku tries to run away, Class A draws him back by recounting their memories with him and reminding him of his own words.

episodes.name: A Young Woman's Declaration
episodes.overview: As the evacuees at U.A. voice their dissent, Ochaco speaks up to try and sway them. Onlookers with ties to Izuku try to figure out if it's time for them to speak out, too.

episodes.name: No Man Is an Island
episodes.overview: As Izuku tries to rest and recover back at U.A. with his classmates, All Might has an encounter with Stain that leads to new information about Shigaraki and All For One.

episodes.name: In the Nick of Time! A Big-Time Maverick from the West
episodes.overview: As jailbreakers run rampant in Japan, Star and Stripe flies from the U.S. to Japan to help and finds Shigaraki waiting for her in the middle of her flight path.

episodes.name: Specter
episodes.overview: The fight between Star and Stripe and Shigaraki is coming to an end, but Star has one more trick up her sleeve with New Order.

episodes.name: Villain
episodes.overview: After failing to steal Star's Quirk, New Order, and losing many other Quirks, Shigaraki and All For One prepare for their next move. Who is the traitor at U.A.?!

episodes.name: The Story of How We All Became Heroes
episodes.overview: Due to his relationship with All For One, Yuga Aoyama calls himself a villain, but Deku tells him that he can still be a hero and reaches a hand out to him.

episodes.name: Let You Down
episodes.overview: As heroes and villains get ready for the coming battle, Deku and the others leave U.A., and Deku is called out by Aoyama, who is supposed to be in a police cell. What does Aoyama want?

episodes.name: Division
episodes.overview: It's finally time for the decisive battle between heroes and villains! The plan by All Might, Aizawa, and the others has them start their fights in various places around Japan!

episodes.name: Inflation
episodes.overview: Even though Shigaraki's Quirks are sealed, he attacks Bakugo and the others with a strange new appearance and power. Meanwhile, Deku is pulled to where Toga was warped and Todoroki and Dabi face off!

episodes.name: Two Flashfires
episodes.overview: Eleven years ago, Toya Todoroki was burned by his own flames and became Dabi. Todoroki faces Dabi's blue flames with a new move of his own. Will he be able to stop his brother?

episodes.name: Extras
episodes.overview: Shoto Todoroki stopped Dabi with his Great Glacial Aegir, and reports of that bolstered the spirits of the heroes fighting in other locations. And Shoto and Dabi's father, Endeavor, is facing the greatest evil, All For One, with Hawks!

episodes.name: Wounded Hero, Burning Bright and True!!
episodes.overview: Before the threat of All For One, Endeavor falls, and Hawks, Jiro, and Tokoyami are also cornered. Even so, Jiro acts like a hero! Endeavor is also encouraged after looking back at his own life.

episodes.name: Light Fades to Rain
episodes.overview: Bakugo's Howitzer Impact didn't work against Shigaraki/All For One, either, and Bakugo is pushed into a corner by Shigaraki's power and words. In order to get him out of that predicament, U.A.'s Big Three take a stand!

episodes.name: Those Who Defend, Those Who Violate
episodes.overview: Bakugo surprised Shigaraki/All For One with Cluster but was then cruelly pierced through. The heroes in all the different locations are getting pushed back... But even so, they will not give up!

episodes.name: A Chain of Events, Across the Ages
episodes.overview: Deku finally arrives at the Coffin in the Sky! Seeing Bakugo and the others defeated by Shigaraki/All For One, Deku shakes with anger. Can he control his feelings and win against Shigaraki? It's finally time for a showdown!

episodes.name: Together With Shoji
episodes.overview: Spinner takes heteromorphs who are exploding with resentment from being persecuted to Central Hospital to get Kurogiri back. Shoji, whose Quirk also makes him a heteromorph, shouts his feelings to them.

episodes.name: Butterfly Effect
episodes.overview: Spinner and Present Mic both yell their hearts out. Will the one waking up to their voices be Kurogiri, or Shirakumo? Meanwhile, fighting Ochaco and the others on Okuto Island, Toga is finally going to use her secret weapon...!

episodes.name: The Chain Thus Far
episodes.overview: Toga consumed Twice's blood, and with Kurogiri's Warp, infinite doubles of Twice appear. Shigaraki's Decay is also released, and the heroes seem to be in a state of despair. But then, help comes from an unexpected quarter...

episodes.name: Hopes
episodes.overview: With the addition of Gentle, La Brava, and Lady Nagant, Deku is able to restrain Shigaraki's hands and confront him on the ground. Meanwhile, at the Gunga Villa site, the rewound All For One shows off his awful power...

episodes.name: It's a Small World
episodes.overview: Shishikura and the other members of Shiketsu High join the fight at the Gunga Villa site, and it's do-or-die as the heroes unite to fight back! But as All For One gets younger, he gets stronger. That's when unexpected backup arrives...!

episodes.name: I Am Here
episodes.overview: Trampling the heroes, All For One flies to become one with Shigaraki, and Dabi is about to explode with the heat he's been storing up in his body. Will the Symbol be able change this hopeless situation?

episodes.name: A Girl's Ego
episodes.overview: Toga transforms into Twice and backs the heroes into a corner with Infinite Doubles. In the midst of that, Ochaco does her best to get close to Toga to talk to her. How does Toga respond...?

episodes.name: Battle Without a Quirk
episodes.overview: Toga returns the smile of Ochaco, who tried to be friends with her. What does Toga do to the seriously-injured Ochaco? Meanwhile, All Might uses "power" developed by a friend to face All For One!
